MangaHelpers is a place where you can find translations for Shonen Manga Shoujo Manga Jyousei Manga. Attention aux novices de lhistoire chinoise vous risquez dap. MangaHelpers also is a community resource that helps translators get their work known to a wider audience and thus increasing the popularity of lesser known Manga.
